title: r/Storiesaboutkevin He's So Dumb He ATE GLASS!
description: r/Storiesaboutkevin In today's episode, OP works at a restaurant and hires the world's DUMBEST employee. Kevin spills a jar of jam, so does he clean it up like a normal person? NOPE! He takes the jam-covered shards of glass and hides it in the food that they serve customers as a way to hide the evidence. When OP confronts Kevin about it, Kevin says that it's totally fine and then tires to prove it by EATING GLASS! He got fired immediately. If you like this episode, follow for more Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
